name: Etherscan
description: Access Ethereum blockchain data like transactions and balances

about.overview: The Etherscan API provides programmatic access to Ethereum blockchain data, enabling developers to retrieve information such as account balances, transactions, token data, and smart contract details. It supports both free and premium plans, with V2 offering multichain support for over 50 EVM-compatible chains using a single API key.
features: Retrieve account balances and transaction histories
Access token supply and transfer events
Query smart contract ABIs and verify source code
useCases: Monitoring wallet balances and token transactions
Automating smart contract verification and analysis

endpoints.description: Returns the ETH balance of a specified address
Returns a list of ERC-20 token transfer events by address
Retrieves the ABI of a smart contract

quickStart: Create an Etherscan account at https://etherscan.io/register
Generate an API key from https://etherscan.io/myapikey
Use the API key in GET/POST requests to query endpoints

authentication.description: Include your API key as a query parameter in the URL using &apikey=YourApiKeyToken
